product_name: Gerber EVO Jr. Serrated Locking Knife
long_description: The featherweight Gerber Evo Jr. serrated locking knife offers one-handed opening with a finger flip that doubles as a protective finger guard. Strong serrated-edge blade is made of 440A stainless steel and coated with non-reflective titanium nitride for added durability. Thumb stud allows smooth, easy one-handed opening and closing; handy pocket ensures easy access. When opened, stainless-steel liner lock mechanism solidly locks blade in place. Gerber Evo Jr. features an anodized aluminum cut-out handle that is lightweight yet durable.
short_description: The featherweight Gerber Evo Jr. serrated locking knife offers one-handed opening with a finger flip that doubles as a protective finger guard.
